data.introduction: Experienced Web developer with sound programming and scripting skills. Eager to learn new technologies and adapt quickly to new frameworks. My aim is to apply 'Test driven' approach to develop fast, scalable, secure and responsive websites following agile methodologies.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a fast, scalable and responsive website for a US based E-Commerce company with test driven approach following agile methodologies.
projectResponsibilites: Developed UI designs and wire frames into a functional web page with quality code.
Built re-usable components and front-end libraries to eliminate code duplication.
Used GraphQL to fetch data from server to client.
Used Query Wrapper (JS Library) to handle API request in the application.
Have basic understanding of SEO and it's best practices.
Used Jest (Unit testing framework) with Enzyme (Testing Utility) to write Unit Tests for the components.
Used Pupeteer (Node Library) to run automated UI testing.
Used Sass with BEM naming for CSS styling.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a MEAN stack application to implement CRUD operations for a portal to manage Employee details.
projectResponsibilites: Created a Back-end server using Node.JS and Express.JS to handle http requests.
Created a Relational Database using MySQL for data storage and retrieval.
Created a Front-end application using Angular 5 and integrated it with the database and server.

projects.projectDescription: Developed a Digital Telemetry transmitter prototype for IRS satellites
projectResponsibilites: Applied the knowledge of communication principles in real time transmission of telemetry data.
Implemented the functionality of Digital Direct Synthesis with a 16-bit NCO.
Designed a DDS based telemetry system.
Simulated a Look-Up table based DDS and verified the output by simulating a pseudo code of the origical on MATLAB.
Synthesized the transmitter functionality onto a PROASIC board, and observed the Phase Modulated output, further updating the currently running frequency values using a MATLAB GUI.

hackathon.title: Infosys Global Hackathon 2019
hackathon.description: Runner up in "Infosys Global Hackathon 2019" at Infosys, Trivandrum DC for developing a mobile application to help the visually challenged people to identify currency notes using Google Cloud Vision. (65 Teams)

certificates.title: Front end Web Developer Nanodegree, Udacity.
JavaScript Proficiency Certification, Google Plural Sight.
Front end Web Developer Nanodegree, Udacity.

skills.skillDetails: Familiar with Redux flow to update store with Connectors, Reducers and Actions.
